hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin 'Abdullah that a man said:"O Messenger of Allah, I have wealth and a son, and my father wants to take all my wealth." He said: "You and your wealth belong to your father

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لِلرَّجُلِ مِنْ مَالِ وَلَدِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What A Man Is Entitled To Of His Son’s Property
